name: Drumpf 2: Lost, But Not Forgotten! - Digital Art Book
detailed_description:
Digital Art Book for Drumpf 2: Lost, But Not Forgotten!

Features:
  • Total number of pages: 124.
  • Format for Art book is .pdf.
  • Contains images of all of the characters, enemies, and companions found in Drumpf 2: Lost, But Not Forgotten!
  • Digital Art book can be located in: ..\Steam\steamapps\common\Drumpf 2 Lost But Not Forgotten\Artbook\
